champ_0290_rival_03:
This is legit incredible! You’re the strongest out
there, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_04:
I mean, you knocked me flat, and I was giving
you absolutely everything I had![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_08: Oh man. Pokémon battling, am I right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_09:
It’s so much better—so much more fun than I ever
even knew![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_10:
Thanks for that incredible match. You beat me
for real this time![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_11:
Now let’s give ourselves a minute and have a
quick break, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0290_rival_13:
Which Pokémon should I bring out this time?
Decisions, decisions![VAR 0114(0004)]
